entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
